C = color
00:     S = Set Hex Color
01:     N = New Random Color
02:     P = Pop Color from Stack
03:     D = Default Color

05: T = Tab
 F = Font 
06:     I = Italic
07:     B = Bold
08:     U = Underline

10:     D = Default
11:     S = Delete/Strike through

13: Align Left

position is the horizontal position, to determin if the breakpoint is reached.

char_size is the width of the character OR THE TAB. important for underline and strikethrough
size (width) of the tab for underline and strikethrough
3. a character following a space is a breakpoint

1. a new tab is ALWAYS a breakpoint

2. a tab is NOT a space

3. a character following a space is a breakpoint
(but following a tab is not a breakpoint)
1. a new tab is ALWAYS a breakpoint
2. A tab is NOT a space (for "was the previous char a space?")
